creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: square bluish-purple velvet skull cap for a woman; gold embroidered with gold sequins; floral motifs with two rust colored and two green colored centers on top; one floral motif on each side--green or rust centers; small white beads in strings of two to four beads on each surrounded motifs on top
medium: Cotton, metallic threads, sequins, beads, cardboard
title: Woman's hat
